DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study primarily determine effect propofol different concentration mitral valve annulus use Tissue Doppler Imaging
DOC.brief_title: Propofol Effects Mitral Valve Annular Velocity
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate effect different concentration propofol patient undergoing cardiac surgery . The patient receive infusion remifentanil 0.5mcg/kg/min different target-site propofol concentration namely 1.0ng/ml , 2.0ng/ml 3.0ng/ml . Tissue Doppler Imaging transesophageal echocardiography do ass change cardiac function .
DOC.criteria: patient undergo cardiac surgery low ejection fraction < 50 % transthoracic echocardiography atrial fibrillation pacemaker pericardial infiltrative myocardial disease mitral annular calcification , surgical ring , prosthetic mitral valve lateral leave ventricular wall motion abnormality oesophageal abnormality history extensive radiation mediastinum upper gastrointestinal bleeding
